医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Adipo Therapeutics 分享潜在肥胖治疗的研究结果Adipo Therapeutics LLC 是一家后期临床前生物制药公司，正在开发一种治疗肥胖和相关代谢紊乱的潜在疗法，该公司在圣安东尼奥肥胖协会年会上展示了两项研究的数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Adipo-Therapeutics-shares-results-of-studies-on-pottial-obesity-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Adipo-Therapeutics-shares-results-of-studies-on-pottial-obesity-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e0a8d0d-2d45-4b8a-bdfe-0539212d2aee Thu, 07 Nov 2024 23:19:32 -0500 Adipo Therapeutics shares results of studies on potential obesity treatment
新的机器人系统可以彻底改变多部位病症的治疗临床实践中，多个疾病部位很常见。例如，在大脑中，血管阻塞会导致中风，缺氧会迅速损害脑细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/New-robotic-system-could-revolutionize-treatment-of-multi-site-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/New-robotic-system-could-revolutionize-treatment-of-multi-site-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e401b5e-4ad6-4171-8eaa-272c41c9be82 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 23:15:52 -0500 New robotic system could revolutionize treatment of multi-site conditions
季节性流感在 COVID-19 大流行期间适应并演变一项新的研究表明，尽管 COVID-19 大流行期间的旅行限制和社会措施导致全球季节性流感病例大幅下降，但特定地区的某些流感谱系使病毒继续传播和进化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Seasonal-influenza-adapted-and-evolved-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Seasonal-influenza-adapted-and-evolved-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c957f75-ed64-4b2f-96fc-a1085024bf6c Thu, 07 Nov 2024 23:05:28 -0500 Seasonal influenza adapted and evolved during the COVID-19 pandemic
调查显示肯塔基州学龄前儿童的蛀牙率令人震惊肯塔基大学牙科学院的 2023 年肯塔基州早期学习者口腔健康监测项目调查发现，肯塔基州 2 至 5 岁儿童的蛀牙率明显高于全国平均水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Survey-reveals-alarming-dental-decay-rates-in-Kentucky-preschoolers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Survey-reveals-alarming-dental-decay-rates-in-Kentucky-preschoolers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1eef7f0-1bd5-46ee-8efc-cbbc6beb0660 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 23:00:03 -0500 Survey reveals alarming dental decay rates in Kentucky preschoolers
新的成像技术增强了 HNSCC 手术中肿瘤和神经的可视化头颈鳞状细胞癌 (HNSCC) 是全球最常见的癌症之一，每年报告的新病例超过 650,000 例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/New-imaging-technique-enhances-tumor-and-nerve-visualization-in-HNSCC-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/New-imaging-technique-enhances-tumor-and-nerve-visualization-in-HNSCC-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0845e864-ef6e-4d29-ab4d-076db521f7bf Thu, 07 Nov 2024 22:04:41 -0500 New imaging technique enhances tumor and nerve visualization in HNSCC surgery
新的生物标志物可以预测 IBD 治疗的反应并非每个人对炎症性肠病 (IBD) 治疗的反应都一样好。对个别患者有效的方法涉及治疗过程中的反复试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/New-biomarker-could-predict-response-to-IBD-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/New-biomarker-could-predict-response-to-IBD-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4585f91b-4ae2-4398-b610-01e7d32bc8fb Thu, 07 Nov 2024 21:49:01 -0500 New biomarker could predict response to IBD treatment
代谢手术减少心力衰竭患者对利尿的依赖Metamor 研究所的彭宁顿生物医学研究中心的研究人员与来自 Our Lady of the Lake 和路易斯安那州立大学新奥尔良健康中心的同事最近确定，对心力衰竭患者进行代谢手术可以减少口服利尿剂的需求，从而减少对口服利尿剂的需求。用于控制静脉和血管压力等症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Metabolic-surgery-cuts-diuretic-dependence-in-heart-failure-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Metabolic-surgery-cuts-diuretic-dependence-in-heart-failure-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3003e7d9-30df-40ee-b308-ee38eef0377c Thu, 07 Nov 2024 21:39:53 -0500 Metabolic surgery cuts diuretic dependence in heart failure patients
研究发现阿片类药物过量患者丙型肝炎发病率较高密苏里大学医学院的新研究表明，密苏里州中部意外服用阿片类药物过量的患者丙型肝炎感染率很高，尽管只有 40% 的患者有检测史。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Study-finds-high-hepatitis-C-rates-among-opioid-overdose-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Study-finds-high-hepatitis-C-rates-among-opioid-overdose- Patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7dc479b-fc5d-4dff-bb86-bdb114d33e41 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 21:35:08 -0500 Study finds high hepatitis C rates among opioid overdose patients

研究揭示了 COVID-19 如何影响季节性流感的传播和演变季节性流感流行给医疗保健系统带来沉重负担，每年导致超过 500 万人住院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Study-reveals-how-COVID-19-affected-the-spread-and-evolution-of-seasonal-influenza.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Study-reveals-how-COVID-19-affected-the-spread-and-evolution-of-seasonal-influenza.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a56a477-ad6d-4534-9ddd-3a5e84b8e532 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 21:18:38 -0500 Study reveals how COVID-19 affected the spread and evolution of seasonal influenza
